about_the_game:
It’s time for some bolt-action bravado! An American classic, the Springfield is here to prove that the classics never go out of style – especially when you need to pop some craniums from a distance!
This Weapon Bundle contains;
- The M1903 Springfield Rifle
- 2 Charms (Ratte Tank, Brauer’s Dog Tags)
- 2 Bespoke Weapon Skins (43 Fighter-bomber, Desert Camo)
detailed_description:
It’s time for some bolt-action bravado! An American classic, the Springfield is here to prove that the classics never go out of style – especially when you need to pop some craniums from a distance!
This Weapon Bundle contains;

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.

short_description: It’s time for some bolt-action bravado! An American classic, the Springfield is here to prove that the classics never go out of style
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
